title: Irish Discovery
inclusions_evidence: Meals: 8 Breakfasts & 3 Dinners; Transport by air-conditioned motorcoach with free Wi-Fi; Selected guided sightseeing; Airfares & transfers are additional.

other.notes: Unable to produce reliable DIY line-item prices for this escorted Cosmos tour without a specified departure city/airport and hotel preferences. Reproducing this tour DIY would require booking multiple hotels across different Irish cities, intercity transport, entrances and some meals — all of which vary widely by date and origin.

reasoning: Flights are explicitly not included per the deal text, so the package price covers land touring (hotels/meals/coach/guides). The escorted-tour inclusions (breakfasts, some dinners, coach transport, local guides) provide clear value versus booking hotels and transport separately, but a reliable DIY comparison requires a departure airport and specific hotel choices. Public reseller listings for the same Cosmos 'Irish Discovery' tour show varying published prices (different currencies/markets), so I cannot confidently compute DIY vs agency savings for this Flight Centre listing without the missing origin/date details.
additional_notes: Next step to get a firm DIY comparison: provide the traveller's departure airport (or country) and travel dates so I can price return international flights plus 8 nights hotel(s) and local transport/options on booking.com/Expedia and compare to this package total.
